name: Monster Extermination Mission
info: Help protect the village by eliminating dangerous monsters. This mission can be repeated as needed.
accept: Thank you! The village depends on brave adventurers like you.
decline: Understandable. These missions are dangerous - return when you're ready.
dialogs: Monsters are threatening the village. Will you help with the extermination?
Zombies, skeletons, spiders, creepers... They're all dangerous.
Bring proof of extermination and I'll reward you.
Well done! The village is safer now.
